clean_data: Communications and Electronics Inspector Communications and Electronics Inspector Communications and Electronics Inspector ACFirst Bagram Airfield Colorado Springs CO Electronic Technician and Military Veteran with a Secret Security Clearance and 5 years of proven experience in the United States Army Accomplished measurable results while assisting team of 5 45 personnel in a dynamic fast paced environment Possess a comprehensive background in Electronic Manufacturing Assembly and Electronic Repair Management derived from conducting domestic and global operations across 2 Countries Managed risk upon multiple lines to protect assets property and equipment valued in excess of over 5M while meeting the expectations of senior leadership Possess extensive knowledge in Help Desk Operations Network administration and Training Management Recipient of multiple awards for outstanding performance and professionalism to including an Army Commendation Medals Career supported by vast operational experience LAN VPN Problem Diagnosis Electronic Repair SMT Soldering BFT1 BFT2 Preventative Maintenance Phone Online Support Systems Installation Customer Service SINGARS Microsoft Office Suite Remedy Ticketing Work Experience Communications and Electronics Inspector ACFirst Bagram Airfield AF May 2018 to Present Responsible for inspecting and making diagnosis on customers equipment Document faults and prepare DD Form 2404 to instruct mechanics to make repairs Test equipment after specified repairs have been made and approve or deny based on findings Worked between customer and shop to maintain communication line and ensure proper procedures are being upheld Final approving authority on repaired equipment Ensure all safety guidelines are being upheld in shop Network Administrator Telesis Corporation Colorado Springs CO June 2017 to April 2018 Responsible for configuring managing monitoring and maintaining a government network infrastructure Evaluate LANWAN performance and capacities to identify problem areas Work with customers and operations staff in scheduling preventive and emergency maintenance to include resolution of customer tickets Use servers to maximize Web hosting terminal server fileprint sharing and domain control performance Troubleshooting LANWAN connections between multiple Servers and create trouble tickets on the behalf of customers using Remedy Ticketing System Subject matter expert with configuration of platform and transceivers via EDG moves and provisions files for FBCB2 BFT JCR and JCRLog Assistant Network Administrator Camber Corporation Colorado Springs CO March 2015 to November 2016 Delivered product installation technical support via phone remote applications and the web Provided Tier I diagnosis and resolution of hardware software and virusrelated issues minimizing downtime and enhancing organization effectiveness Managed users accounts through Active Directory verified information assurance training and other requirements prior to granting access to new users Installed and configured antivirus software in support of organization requirements educated users on cyber security Researched client questions using all available information resources including internet documents knowledge based articles books and manuals Performed password resets system access and system access termination for employees and staff members Communications and Security Maintainer United States Army 2009 to 2014 Supervised a team of 4 in the daily operations of repair and maintenance of advanced electronic handheld communication systems valued at 500K Oversaw and managed the maintenance of over 15M worth of equipment such as weapon systems communication equipment and night vision goggles with 100 accountability Reviewed equipment maintenance schedules and notified the operator of the services needed averaged 50 electronic systems per month Subject matter expert for installation of SINGARS systems DAGRS JCR and JCRLog as well as Requisitioned and maintained inventories of bench stock items materials and supplies necessary to meet repair demands through Federal Logistics Data and Unit Supply systems Provided technical and administrative assistance to senior management on personnel programs and procedures Prepared reports to track maintenance activities to provide senior leadership the overall health and readiness of organizational equipment Radio CommunicationsSecurity Repairer Repaired communication equipment and subassemblies by adjusting aligning and replacing defective components of cryptographic items worth 1M in a 1year period Performed tests on equipment to verify operability of repaired equipment and ensures security standards are met Enforced strict quality control while performing logistics maintenance on equipment to reduce budgetary constraints Troubleshooting for Single Channel Ground and Airborne Radio System SINCGARS and Advanced System Improvement Program ASIP radios CertificationsLicenses Security CE March 2019 to March 2022 Cisco Certified Network Associate CCNA July 2019 to July 2022
